repairedDockerfile:
FROM cotdsa/docker-ubuntu:latest 
WORKDIR /usr/src/app 

RUN apt-get update \  
&& apt-get install -fy --no-install-recommends \  
gcc \  
libffi-dev \  
libpq-dev \  
libssl-dev \  
python3-dev \  
python3-pip \  
wget \  
&& apt-get clean \  
&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* 

RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app \
&& pip3 install --no-cache-dir --upgrade \
pip \
virtualenv \
&& virtualenv -p /usr/bin/python3 /usr/src/venv && rm -rf /usr/src/app

RUN chown -R ubuntu:ubuntu /usr/src/app /usr/src/venv 
USER ubuntu
